column5: Description
Nathaniel costs 3 Action Points. /n/n When Nathaniel enters the battlefield, destroy a random enemy creature.
While Cassiel is on the battlefield, all other Angels get +20/+0. When Cassiel is attacked, the attacking creature gets -10/-0 until end of turn.
When Ariel enters the battlefield, restore all Angels Health Points to their original totals.
Dispatch /n/n When Dina attacks, give a random enemy -10/-0 until end of turn.
Lailah costs 2 Action Points. /n/n When Lailah enters the battlefield, draw an Angel from your library.

Miicah costs 3 Action Points. /n/n When Miicah enters the battlefield, return a random Angel that died this game to the battlefield. Then remove all ghouls on the battlefield and libraries from the game.
When Gavril enters the battlefield, prevent all damage done to all creatures until your next turn.
When Cipher enters the battlefield, you must pay a Life Point, then put two random spells into your hand. (class cards are not included)
Incubi costs two Action Points. /n/n When Incubi enters the battlefield, you must pay a Life point, then destroy target creature.
When Loki enters the battlefield, you must pay a Life Point, then draw 3 cards.
When Wraith enters the battlefield, you must pay a Life Point, then give another target creature +30/+60
Indomitable Dispatch
Indomitable /n/n When Resolute Nymph enters the battlefield, draw a Fairy from your deck.
Indomitable, Dispatch /n/n When Cunning Nymph enters the battlefield, all fairies you control get +20/+0 until end of turn.
Indomitable /n/n When Wily Sprite enters the battlefield, target creature get's -x/-x where x is the number of fairies you control.
Indomitable /n/n When Archer Nymph enters the battlefield, destroy a trap card at random. (This is any trap card currently on the battlefield)
When Flame Flinger enters the battlefield, deal 15 damage to target creature.
When Immolation Imp dies, deal 20 damage to another target creature.
When Inferno Hound attacks after from defence mode, deal 10 damage to all non-fire creatures on the battlefield.
3 AP  Persist /n/n When Ghulah enters the battlefield, Ghulah gains +10/+10 for each creature that's died this game.
3 AP  Persist /n/n When Ghulah enters the battlefield, Ghulah gains +10/+10 for each creature that's died this game.
When Iranemite Destoryer enters the battlefield, sacrifice another mech, if you don't sacrifice this. /n/n Destroy a target creature with Taunt.
When Nesting Gryphon enters the battlefield, return a friendly creature to it's owners hand. /n/n When Nesting Gryphon dies, draw a card.
Dispatch /n/n When Bestial Gryphon dies, give all other beasts you control +10/+0.
Mech Gunship cannot attack. /n/n At the end of your turn deal 15 damage to all non-mech creatures.
4 AP /n/n Destroy all other creatures and traps on the battlefield, then destroy the rest of your library and discard your hand.
